info.title: API URI: /message-docs/mar2017
info.description: An Open Source API for Banks.  (c) TESOBE Ltd. 2011 - 2016. Licensed under the AGPL and commercial licences.  Decomposed from Master PSD2 Swagger (http://psd2.it/#psd2apps).  Generated by psd2-generator: https://github.com/ericbroda/psd2-generator

get.description: These message docs provide example messages sent by OBP to the (Kafka) message queue for processing by the Core Banking / Payment system Adapter - together with an example expected response and possible error codes. Integrators can use these messages to build Adapters that provide core banking services to OBP. Note: To enable Kafka connector and this message format, you must set conenctor=kafka_vMar2017 in your Props
